rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: Only way for Hazen to improve would be if he picked up my bar tabs on Thursday nights.  Would highly recommend for an engaging (not a BS) independent study, if you have any interest in the SJM.
He found a way to make Business Associations pretty interesting. The material is rather straightforward and the multiple choice exam was pretty easy.

Hazen is the man on this subject. He knows Business Associations inside and out. The Supreme Court cites him (I'm not joking). He is crystal clear on his points. But, he does cover a lot of ground, and there is a ton of material for the final.
